body.name: Mompush Lithe Double Ultralight Stroller, Lightweight Side by Side Stroller, Two Large Seats with Individual Recline, Easy Fold
features: ULTRA LIGHTWEIGHT - Weighs at 25.4 lb, features the all-aluminum frame in terms of lightweight and durability. The Lithe Double is the lightest twin strollers on the market. Disney Size Approved!

COMPACT SIZE - The width fully assembled is 30 inches fits through standard doorways. Super quick and easy one-step standing fold, so you can fold and go. Convenient carry handle to lift stroller with ease. Folded Dimensions: 30"L x23"W x 9"H.

KEEP ON ROLLING - Puncture-poof airless tires and all-wheel suspension ensure excellent performance on any road surface and terrain. 5-point safety harnesses and one step break lock are designed to provide an added layer of safety.

SIDE BY SIDE - Allowing both kids to have equal access to views and interaction while on the move. Each seat holds up to 40 lbs. (80 lbs. total). The seats recline independently and feature adjustable leg rests for added comfort. Two large canopies with UPF50+ protection can be unzipped separately to shield each child from the sun, while a peek-a-boo windows let parents keep an eye on their little ones.

ROOMY STORAGE - With plenty of storage in this stroller, you won’t have to leave anything at home. Include one cup holder for drinks, two large and easy to access storage basket holds all baby's necessities. Rain cover is also included.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lithe Double | Ultralight Side by Side Stroller Twice the lightness, twice the comfort. Lithe Double is Mompush's new ultra-light and ultra-compact double buggy perfect for your two little bundles of joy.

Features You'll Love Everyday Companion Lightweight and narrow, Disney size approved. Take on all of your daily adventures (and standard doorways) without skipping a beat. Built-In Comfort Features dual seats with independently adjustable reclining options. The footrests can be adjusted offer maximum comfort as your children grow. Whatever the Weather Keep your little ones safe and dry until the storm passes with the included rain cover. Use the cup holder to store your ice-cold beverage. Stow and Go Folds up easily and stands independently. Use the convenient carrying handle to make loading and unloading simple and stress-free.

mompush Parenthood, Understood. Parenthood is a beautiful journey filled with challenges, and we're here to support you every step of the way. mompush Parenthood, Understood. Our products are designed with you and your little ones in mind, providing the perfect blend of style and functionality. mompush Parenthood, Understood. At Mompush, we know that being a parent isn't easy, but we're here to make it a little more understood. mompush Parenthood, Understood. Trust us to push you through parenthood with ease and style.

What are the specifications? -Accommodates little ones from 6 months through 40 pounds for each seat. -Unfolded: 31.1" L x 30" W x 40.2" H -Folded: 30" L x 23.6" W x 10.2" H What are the wheels made of? The wheels are made of PU tire. Pneumatic tire is a rubber tire that provides a comfortable, smooth ride on many different terrains. What's included? Double Stroller +Rain Cover What's the recline angle? According to the US CPSC Safety Standard, to ensure the safety of children, the minimum and maximum angle of Lithe Double’s recline is around 125 degrees to 145 degrees.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice stroller that is pretty lightweight too. Got this one after already owning another stroller but the other brand was much heavier so it was hard take it out of car. This new stroller also takes up very little space that it easily fits in my sedan and I still have room for groceries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a great quality product.
reviews.reviewText: We really like it but seat is little small for our kid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is pretty light weight and what I really like is that I can fold it with one hand and carry with one hand it makes my life so much easier. My only problem with it is it doesn’t go up as much as I’d like it to so my kids end up slightly tilted towards the back. But I have found this to be the same with the other two single strollers I’ve owned. I use it at Disneyland most of the time and it fits in at least all shops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to purchase this due to lack of reviews and no name brand but I wasn’t happy with the big name options plus their prices were just too high. I was very specific in the features I was looking for and I’m happy with my purchase. First of all it’s extremely light weight and compact which was super important to me for small space and travel ability. No problem getting in and out of the car and also great for the airport. The fold and unfold is beautiful! One handed no need to lean over the front and pull with two hands, I could fold this while holding a baby and I love that it folds in on itself to protect the fabric. It has canopies with a zipper third panel that are good and they also have magnetic peekaboo windows to not wake baby. The foot rests are adjustable although I can’t see myself ever putting them down bc if we do the seats are too shallow. With the foot rests out the seats are fine. Love the harness and closure and it comes with a cup holder! There is lack of storage in the back of the seats so I bought a mommy organizer that I clipped on. The height of the seats is not great. My 5 year olds head hits the top pocket but she’ll manage and walk most of the time but keep in mind if you have tall children it’s not great. Because it’s lightweight it definitely feels heavy to push with my 3 year old and 5 year old but I knew that I would be compromising there and didn’t care because I prefer the weight of the stroller to be lighter. The bottom baskets are what sold me. They’re not huge but they are generous enough and ACCESSIBLE! The flap pops out to open up bigger and I can fit a full diaper bag on each basket. The recline is average- not full, so no newborn but it’s enough for a nap. I wish the upright position was a little straighter but it’s decent - some strollers are literally still reclined when upright. This one is slightly still tilted but fine enough. I plan to bring this to Disney and can’t wait. Hope to update my review after that! Overall a good unique buy that served my main priority needs - lightweight, compact, good fold, big storage baskets below. Check!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Would not recommend
reviews.reviewText: the stroller itself is not meant for toddlers who are tall. I have irish twins and they are 3 and 4 and they were not comfortable at all.The real headache cane with shipping this item back I was initially charged $150 I had to be constantly messaging the company and then amazonthis is sold and shipped through a third party so just beware because they were hesitant to give me a refund and shipping back was a nightmare

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to love this stroller but I ended up returning due to the fact that the seats don’t sit completely upright. My kids were so slouched and very uncomfortable. It has a sleek style, light weight, easy to open and collapse but ultimately the slouchy seats were a deal breaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: We have a two year old and three month old at the time of purchase and we travel via airplane often and absolutely LOVE this stroller. It opens and closes quickly, light weight, individually adjustable seats, carrying handle, single break and handlebar all make this my favorite purchase lately

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Phenomenally easy and great stroller
reviews.reviewText: First of all, the stroller is incredibly easy to open and close! I have had several double strollers and I have never had one that I can get in and out of my car this quickly before. The handlebar is relatively high and the wheels glide really beautifully. There is nice storage bins underneath, and the leg rests are pretty sturdy. The canopies are a nice size as well. My one complaint is that the seats are slightly too reclined, but my two kids seem comfortable in it so that might just be my perception. Definitely recommend this stroller for the price point
